content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; research set to automation; electrical_id updated to 8208.
- ElectricityGroup (id=8208) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; final status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) producing steam; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system now set to [30036].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system now set to [30036].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30036 – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30037 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=30038 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=30043 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30042 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30047 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=30046 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=30049 – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  - Repeated connection attempts used outdated or incorrect fluid_system identifiers (e.g., 29692, 29735, 29778, 29821, 29864, 29907, 29950, 29993) which do not match the current working identifier (30036). Verify and use the active fluid_system value from the updated pipeline network.
  
• Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Fixed waiting periods (10 seconds) for pipeline stabilization lead to unnecessary delays. Replace static delays with dynamic connectivity checks to ensure the pipeline is ready before attempting further connections.
